sequential.script: val = project.getProperty( ".value" ); reversed = val.split('').reverse().join(''); // Character-by-chracter reverse. reversed = reversed.replace( /\}([0-9]+)\{/g, "{$1}" ); // Fix template syntax. reversed = reversed.replace( /\.\.\.(.*)/, "$1..." ); // Tripple dots belong at the end. reversed = reversed.replace( /([a-z])\x26([^\x26]|$)/gi, "\x26$1$2" ); // Maintain the same mnemonic chracter. reversed = reversed.replace( />(.*)</, "<$1>" ); // Common meta text brackets. project.setProperty( ".reversed", reversed );
